changes_summary.terminal_tools_ts: Extracted spawnAndTrackSession() and getActiveSessions() as shared exports. handleTerminalRun now delegates to spawnAndTrackSession after auth.
changes_summary.interactive_terminal_tools_ts: New handler with relaxed auth: destructive=BLOCKED, shell operators=ALLOWED_WITH_WARNING, non-allowlisted=ALLOWED_WITH_WARNING, allowlisted=ALLOWED. Shares session store with memory_terminal.
changes_summary.memory_terminal_interactive_ts: Consolidated router with 4 actions: run, read_output, kill, list. Reuses handleReadOutput and handleKill from terminal.tools.ts.
changes_summary.index_ts: Registered memory_terminal_interactive as 8th MCP tool with Zod schema.
changes_summary.consolidated_index_ts: Added export for memoryTerminalInteractive, updated doc comment to 8 tools.

test_results.overall: 1070 passed, 15 failed (pre-existing handle-spawn.test.ts failures unrelated to this work)
